## Introduction
This is a basic Quarto document rendered as a Jupyter notebook.

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 2 * np.pi, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title("Sine Wave")
plt.show()
```
